summary: This document is an email with the subject 'MCC NY Camera Outage Report.xlsx' sent on August 16, 2019, containing an attachment of a camera outage report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The email was sent the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody, suggesting it relates to security monitoring at the facility where he died.

events.title: Camera Outage Report Email
events.description: An email is sent with an attached camera outage report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York (MCC NY).

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC NY)
keyFacts: An email regarding a camera outage report at MCC NY was sent on August 16, 2019.
The email was sent one day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody at MCC NY.
The subject and attachment suggest a focus on security camera functionality at the correctional facility.
